com.lukflug.panelstudio.popup

Interface IPopup

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    IFixedComponent, IFixedComponentProxy<T>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    DraggableComponent, FixedComponent, HUDComponent, HUDPanel, HUDPanel.HUDPanelComponent, ListComponent, PopupComponent, ResizableComponent
    Functional Interface:
    This is a functional interface and can therefore be used as the assignment target for a lambda expression or method reference.

    @FunctionalInterface
public interface IPopup
    Interface representing a pop-up, e.g. a tooltip.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void setPosition(IInterface inter, java.awt.Rectangle component, java.awt.Rectangle panel, IPopupPositioner positioner)
      Set the pop-up position based on the information given in the arguments.

    • Method Detail

      • setPosition

        void setPosition(IInterface inter,
                 java.awt.Rectangle component,
                 java.awt.Rectangle panel,
                 IPopupPositioner positioner)
        Set the pop-up position based on the information given in the arguments.
        Parameters:
        inter - the current IInterface
        component - the position of the component displaying the pop-up
        panel - the position of that component's panel
        positioner - the IPopupPositioner to be used
